### グラフの描画
```{python}
import numpy as np
import plotly.graph_objects as go
N = 30
t=np.linspace(0,1,N)
x0=np.cos(t*4*np.pi)
y0=np.sin(t*4*np.pi)
z0=t*10
fig = go.Figure(data=[go.Scatter3d(x=x0, y=y0, z=z0,
                                   mode='markers',
                                   marker=dict(
                                    size=3,
                                    color=z0,
                                    colorscale='mygbm',
                                    opacity=0.7
    ))])
fig
```
